# Flarum Spoiler Alert

Spoiler Alert BBCode for Flarum.

![pages_front]

## Installation

Run following command via SSH while you're in Flarum root folder:

```bash
composer require sijad/flarum-ext-spoiler-alert
```

## Usage

```text
[SPOILER]Content To Hide[/SPOILER]
```
